statements: SELECT * FROM game_state;
SELECT player_id, player_name, player_score FROM game_state WHERE game_level = 3;
SELECT game_state_json FROM game_state WHERE player_id = 1001;
SELECT player_name, player_score FROM game_state WHERE game_level > 2 ORDER BY player_score DESC;
SELECT game_id, player_id, player_name FROM game_state WHERE game_map ILIKE '%forest%' LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM game_state WHERE player_score > 100 ORDER BY player_name DESC;
SELECT player_id, player_name, game_level, player_score FROM game_state WHERE player_id = 3;
SELECT game_id, player_name, game_map FROM game_state WHERE game_level BETWEEN 1 AND 5 ORDER BY game_id;
SELECT DISTINCT(player_id) FROM game_state WHERE player_score < 50;
SELECT game_id, game_map FROM game_state WHERE player_name LIKE 'J%' AND game_map NOT NULL LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM game_sessions;
SELECT game_name, current_players FROM game_sessions WHERE current_players > 0;
SELECT session_id, game_name, current_players, game_state FROM game_sessions WHERE game_name = 'Chess';
SELECT player_id, player_name, player_score FROM player_stats ORDER BY player_score DESC;
SELECT player_name, player_score, session_id FROM player_stats WHERE player_score BETWEEN 100 AND 200;
SELECT * FROM game_sessions WHERE game_name = 'Chess';
SELECT session_id, game_name FROM game_sessions WHERE current_players > 5 ORDER BY game_name DESC;
SELECT player_id, player_name, player_score FROM player_stats WHERE player_score >= 1000 AND session_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM player_stats WHERE player_name LIKE 'J%' AND session_id IN (SELECT session_id FROM game_sessions WHERE game_name = 'Poker');
SELECT player_name, game_name FROM player_stats JOIN game_sessions ON player_stats.session_id = game_sessions.session_id WHERE player_score < 500 ORDER BY player_name ASC, game_name DESC;
SELECT player_name, player_score FROM player_data;
SELECT * FROM player_data WHERE player_score > 1000;
SELECT room_name, total_players FROM game_rooms ORDER BY total_players DESC;
SELECT player_name, action_timestamp FROM player_actions JOIN player_data ON player_actions.player_id = player_data.player_id;

SELECT player_name, room_name, action_timestamp FROM player_actions JOIN player_data ON player_actions.player_id = player_data.player_id JOIN game_rooms ON player_actions.room_id = game_rooms.room_id;
SELECT * FROM player_data ORDER BY player_id DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT player_name, player_score FROM player_data WHERE player_score >= 100 ORDER BY player_score DESC;
SELECT player_name, room_name, total_players FROM player_data INNER JOIN game_rooms ON player_data.player_id = game_rooms.room_id;
SELECT player_name, action_timestamp, action_type FROM player_data JOIN player_actions ON player_data.player_id = player_actions.player_id ORDER BY action_timestamp DESC;
SELECT player_name, last_active FROM player_data WHERE last_active BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY last_active ASC;
SELECT player_name, game_room_id FROM players;
SELECT room_id, game_name, capacity FROM game_rooms;
SELECT * FROM game_state WHERE room_id = 1001;
SELECT player_id, action_type, action_data FROM game_actions WHERE room_id = 2002;
SELECT player_name, action_type, action_timestamp FROM players INNER JOIN game_actions ON players.player_id = game_actions.player_id;
SELECT player_name, game_name FROM players JOIN game_rooms ON players.game_room_id = game_rooms.room_id;
SELECT player_name, action_type, action_timestamp FROM players JOIN game_actions ON players.player_id = game_actions.player_id;
SELECT room_id, game_name, capacity FROM game_rooms WHERE capacity > 10 ORDER BY room_id DESC;
SELECT player_name FROM players WHERE player_id IN (SELECT player_id FROM game_actions WHERE action_type = 'move');
SELECT state_data->>'score' AS score, player_name FROM game_state JOIN players ON players.game_room_id = game_state.room_id WHERE state_data->'score' > '100';
SELECT * FROM game_sessions;
SELECT game_name, player_count, session_id FROM game_sessions WHERE player_count > 5;
SELECT player_name, session_id FROM players ORDER BY player_name DESC;
SELECT state_id, session_id FROM game_states WHERE state_id BETWEEN 100 AND 200;
SELECT player_id, action_type, timestamp FROM player_actions ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM game_sessions;
SELECT game_name, player_count FROM game_sessions WHERE player_count > 5;
SELECT session_id, game_name FROM game_sessions ORDER BY game_name DESC;
SELECT player_name, session_id FROM players JOIN game_sessions ON players.session_id = game_sessions.session_id;
SELECT action_id, session_id, action_type, timestamp FROM game_actions WHERE session_id = 101 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
